snadResult.label: Neutral
snadResult.reason: The buyer's complaint about fit is subjective; the size label is correct and there is no material mismatch.

primaryOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
primaryOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:

Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The buyer's complaint about fit is subjective; the size label is correct and there is no material mismatch.
